pollaxmud.world

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • pollaxmud.world.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a Room. A room consists of a Name, a x and y coordinate, lists of Creatures and Items, and a boolean representing whether the Room is locked or not. It also consists of four Room fields, one in each direction.
    Author:
    Daniel and Oscar

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String name,
            boolean unlocked)
        First constructor for a Room. Set the center coordinates to (0,0).
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the room.
        unlocked - True if unlocked door false if locked.

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String name,
            boolean unlocked,
            int x,
            int y)
        Second constructor for a Room.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the room
        unlocked - True for unlocked false for locked door.
        x - Center X-coordinate.
        y - Center Y-coordinate

        public void deleteItemByName(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes an item from a room by it's name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item to delete.

      • printEntranceText

        public void printEntranceText()
        Prints info about the room. The name of the room, what items are in it, what creatures are in it and where it's possible to go.

      • setRoomInDirection

        public void setRoomInDirection(Room room,
                               Direction direction)
        Set what room is in different directions of the current room.
        Parameters:
        room - The room to add in a direction.
        direction - The direction to add the room to.

      • getRoomInDirection

        public Room getRoomInDirection(Direction direction)
        Gets the room in a direction of the current room.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to get the room from.
        Returns:
        The room. Null if no room there.

      • getUnlocked

        public boolean getUnlocked()
        Get the locked/unlocked status of a room.
        Returns:
        True for unlocked and false for locked.

      • unlock

        public void unlock()
        Unlocks the room.

      • getSphinx

        public Creature getSphinx()
        If there is a Sphinx in the room returns it. If not returns null.
        Returns:
        A Sphinx if present, else null.

      • containsTeacher

        public boolean containsTeacher()
        Checks if the room contains a Teacher.
        Returns:
        True if the room contains a Teacher, else false.

      • getRandomTeacher

        public Teacher getRandomTeacher()
        Get a random teacher from the room if there is any teachers.
        Returns:
        A Teacher if there is any in the room, else null.

      • getCreatureByName

        public Creature getCreatureByName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds a creature in the room with the same name as a given string.
        Parameters:
        name - The given string to compare with creature names.
        Returns:
        A Creature with the same name as the given string if such Creature exists, else null.
